content:
As an AI language model, I don't have the ability to listen to songs or have personal tastes or opinions. However, I can give you some information on Michael Ray's music.

Michael Ray is a country music singer from Florida. He has released three studio albums, which feature a mix of traditional and modern country styles. Some of his other popular songs include "Kiss You in the Morning", "Get to You", and "One That Got Away". Michael Ray's music often explores themes of love, heartbreak, and small-town life, similar to many other country artists.
